<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Check user impersonation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/security/impersonate/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks if a user with the ID specified in the request can be impersonated or not.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"userId","in":"path","description":"User ID","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Boolean value: true - the user can be impersonated, false - the user cannot be impersonated","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
